attributes.action: Scrap the soft approach given to child sex offenders, harsher penalties!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am disgusted almost every day of news that a either a Paedophile has been let off or has been living next to a school since their release. For the saftey of our children.
Let the decent law abiding citizens know where these convicted perverts are being released. I personally believe i have a right to know if i am living next door to a paedophile, so i can protect my children, They are the ones in danger, the innocent should be protected!
